meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>corridor</kanji> is <kanji>below</kanji>. What do you call a corridor that's below? Well, really it's still just a <vocabulary>corridor</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>hallway</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
